customer_reviews.title: Great Little Heater
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this heater over a year ago and was saddened when it was recalled due to wiring melting in the switch potentially causing a fire (mine had started having this issue). This one I just purchased is the exact same brand and design. Really pushes the heat out (on high the air temperature exiting the heater registers 244 degrees) and oscillation is nice and quiet. It warms a 15' x 15' room with ease. Assuming the manufacturer resolved the safety issue this will be used by me for a many years.
